name: flash-fire

effect.sword_shield: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.

effect.the_crown_tundra: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.

effect.legends_arceus: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.

short_effect: Protects against fire moves. Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Powers up the Pokémon’s Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.
